channel.title: Deltascape Please Help
channel.description: Hey im on deltascape source and i was wondering if anyone knew what to search for to change the amount of exp u get from fishing and if there is any way to add more rewards from clue scrolls than just the standard delta ones Finally does anyone know how to change the rewards from pestcontrol and how many points they cost?

item.title: Deltascape Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

thanks for helping me guys worked all of them out b ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Please Help
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

Fishing spots are actually NPCS

They should have IDS. Just go on silab to test it.

Then open client.java search for their ID you should see something that has the addItem and stuff just change the exp.

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

So if i add some numbers after the clue thing should it add stuff in this bit i mean

{3841,3843,3486,3488,3841,3843,3486,3488,3841,3843,3486,3488,2856,2857,2858,2856,2857,2858,2856,2857,2858,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,26[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 01:35:19 pm[/size][hr]Oh and thank you very much for your help it is greatly appreciated

item.title: Deltascape Please Help
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i dont know bout the first one
but about clues
go to item.java and search for clue
it should look like this

[code] public static int Clue[] = {3841,3843,3486,3488,3841,3843,3486,3488,3841,3843,3486,3488,2856,2857,2858,2856,2857,2858,2856,2857,2858,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2856,2857,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,2653,2655,2657,2659,2661,2663,2665,2667,2669,2671,2673,2675,638,640,642,648,650,652,658,660,662,2589};

    public static int randomClue()
    {
        return Clue[(int)(Math.random()*Clue.length)];
    }[/code]

and the pest control
go to clickingmost.java and find case 40132
mine looks like this because i edited it a little

case 40132: c.option = 1; break; case 40133: c.option = 2; break; case 25155: c.option = 3; break; case 25160: c.option = 4; break; case 40122: if(c.option == 0 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have not chosen a reward!"); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 1 && c.pcPoints > 99 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded 100000 strength xp!"); c.addSkillXP(100000, 2); c.pcPoints -= 100; c.closeInterface(); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 1 && c.pcPoints < 100 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You do not have enough points!"); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 2 && c.pcPoints > 149 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded full void knight!"); c.addItem(7993, 1); c.addItem(7994, 1); c.addItem(7995, 1); c.addItem(7996, 1); c.addItem(7997, 1); c.addItem(8060, 1); c.addItem(8071, 1); c.pcPoints -= 150; c.closeInterface(); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 2 && c.pcPoints < 150 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You do not have enough points!"); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 3 && c.pcPoints > 99 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded 100000 magic xp!"); c.addSkillXP(100000, 6); c.pcPoints -= 100; c.closeInterface(); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 3 && c.pcPoints < 100 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You do not have enough points!"); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 4 && c.pcPoints > 99 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You have been rewarded 100000 range xp!"); c.addItem(100000, 4); c.pcPoints -= 100; c.closeInterface(); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(c.option == 4 && c.pcPoints < 100 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){ c.sM("You do not have enough points!"); c.actionInterval = 6000; c.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

Read full topic
